Text:
Installation Info :---

Run sambc-fb-v492.exe

To Install Spacial SAM Broadcaster v4.9.2

follow The Onscreen Instructions By The Installer

When Finish Installing, UnTick -> [ Show Readme ]

And Click Finish To Complete The Setup, Now Make Sure The

Program Is Not Running, Now Go To The Folder [ SAM.Broadcaster.v4.9.2 With Patch ] 

Extract SAM.Broadcaster.v4.9.2 With Patch RAR File With Help Of Winrar

Copy Patch File

Go to Installation Folder 

Paste it..

And Run SAM.Broadcaster.v4.9.2 With Patch File

Done Enjoy !!! .
